body_html: @carpodaster yeah, it's just that we had that conversation above apparently and I can see why there was the idea of adding a bit of information (a lot of people seem to be still confused about the use of the almighty monster teams app). Would love to take this on with, as you said, a box that gives some information about the app and redirects to rgsoc.org if needed.
